tvshowdetails.label: Gotham
tvshowdetails.plot: An action-drama series following rookie detective James Gordon as he battles villains and corruption in pre-Batman Gotham City.
tvshowdetails.title: Gotham

1.label: 1x01. Pilot
1.plot: Detective James Gordon performs his work in the dangerously corrupt city of Gotham, which consistently teeters between good and evil.
1.title: Pilot

1.label: 1x02. Selina Kyle
1.plot: Detectives Gordon and Bullock investigate a child trafficking ring preying on Gotham's street kids, including Selina Kyle. Penguin resurfaces in the countryside and begins to make his way back to Gotham.
1.title: Selina Kyle

1.label: 1x03. The Balloonman
1.plot: Gordon and Bullock track down a vigilante who uses weather balloons to kill corrupt citizens; Cobblepot gets a job close to a major figure in the underworld.
1.title: The Balloonman

1.label: 1x04. Arkham
1.plot: Politicians on both sides of the Arkham district issue are in danger as the vote approaches; Gordon gets a visit from an old friend.
1.title: Arkham

1.label: 1x05. Viper
1.plot: Gordon and Bullock search for the source of a new street drug that causes euphoria then death. Oswald Cobblepot works his way deeper into Maroni's inner circle. Fish Mooney continues to plot against Falcone.
1.title: Viper

1.label: 1x06. Spirit of the Goat
1.plot: When a killer begins targeting the first born of Gotham's elite, Bullock is forced to confront traumatic memories from a nearly identical case he worked in the past. Gordon is confronted by past decisions.
1.title: Spirit of the Goat

1.label: 1x07. Penguin's Umbrella
1.plot: As violence between Maroni and Falcone continues to escalate, Penguin reveals a new element of his manipulative strategy, forcing Gordon to deal with the consequences of his decision to spare Penguin’s life.
1.title: Penguin's Umbrella

1.label: 1x08. The Mask
1.plot: Gordon and Bullock investigate a Gothamite who runs a deadly fight club for candidates applying for a job at his financial firm. Meanwhile, Bruce returns to school and gets a visit from a new friend.
1.title: The Mask
